title: [GAMEPLAY] Enemy team items invisible PBE
body:
On the latest patch of the PBE there's a bug that prevents you to see the enemy's items.
As much through the scoreboard as when clicking on the champion.

replies.body:
Hey!

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating! 

As ShadowTeen20 said, please use the [report a bug](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) feature on the PBE to report issues occurring there, as opposed to these boards which focus on live issues.

Thanks!

Hi,
Please post this on the PBE boards, as in reference to the NA server, this post can be/is deemed irrelevant.

saw this on a streamers game last night. 

...flirted with the idea of 'what if' they made it an intentional change.
